definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of catgut implantation at acupoint on obesity rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨穴位埋线方法对肥胖大鼠减肥的作用机制。

sentences.english: But its long-term effect is worse than that of multi-acupoints group.
sentences.chinese: 主要不足之处为远期疗效较多穴埋线组差。

sentences.english: Embedding method is thread sewn into the skin, thereby creating a double eyelid adhesions.
sentences.chinese: 埋线法是将细线缝入皮下，从而制造重睑的粘连。

sentences.english: Objective To study the causes and treatments of complications of double-eyelid plasty with buried suture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨埋线重睑术并发症的原因及其处理。

sentences.english: We studied a method of the forehead and brow lift with continue buried sutures .
sentences.chinese: 我们研究了一种连续埋线缝合小切口提额提眉术。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the surgical method of double eyelids with modified buried sutures and its results.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨改良埋线法重睑术的手术方法及术后效果。

definition: abbr. for 微整形[wei1 zheng3 xing2]
non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
shaping/reshaping/plastic surgery or orthopedics (abbr. of 整形外科[zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1])
